-- カラム追加 IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderItem' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'subscription_box_course_id') BEGIN ALTER TABLE [w2_OrderItem] ADD [subscription_box_course_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderItem' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'subscription_box_fixed_amount') BEGIN ALTER TABLE [w2_OrderItem] ADD [subscription_box_fixed_amount] [decimal] (18, 3) END GO
-- 頒布会コースID、頒布会定額価格の補正用クエリ UPDATE w2_OrderItem SET w2_OrderItem.subscription_box_course_id = w2_Order.subscription_box_course_id, w2_OrderItem.subscription_box_fixed_amount = w2_Order.subscription_box_fixed_amount FROM w2_OrderItem INNER JOIN w2_Order ON ( w2_OrderItem.order_id = w2_Order.order_id AND w2_Order.subscription_box_course_id <> '' )
